name: Userflow / Sitemap Responsive Template for UI/UX and Web Design
description:
User Flow | Site Map Template with Variant.

This is a user flow tool which can be used for sitemaps as well. this is Template is responsive and based on auto layout. You can use it however you like.

How to use it?

  1. Copy the web page frame for each ui screen or webpage.
  2. Copy buttons or links of it.
  3. Change the type of link from variant.
  4. Just like show in picture.


Copy this project whenever you need. Don't reinvent the wheel.
